description: A lightweight midlayer jacket that knows no limits. A reliable partner whether you enjoy hiking, climbing, mountaineering or snow sports, its wind-repellent, breathable material protects you from the elements while flat seams and waffle fleece make it comfortable against the skin. With added elastane for optimal freedom of movement, this recycled polyester jacket is treated for sustainable, silver-free odor control. The hood fits comfortably under your helmet and your phone in your chest pocket, ready to capture the next inspiring landscape.
name: Mammut Madris Light ML Hooded Jacket - Mens

specs.value: Stormfleece® double weave fleece with 4-way stretch
